content: stitches round 5- single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 stitches round 6- single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook close arms black and natural 3 threads of each 0000 hook chain 9 with black work back and forth round 1- turn and single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in each chain 8 stitches round 2- single_crochet in each single_crochet 8 stitches repeat round 2 three more times change to natural color round 6- single_crochet in each single_crochet 8 stitches repeat round 6 three more times turn work 90 degrees and pick up 9 single_crochet on the other side of the work continue back and forth 3 more rounds of 8 single_crochet close chest natural 3 threads 0000 hook 1st part chain 9 work back and forth round 1- turn and single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in each chain 8 stitches round 2- single_crochet in each single_crochet 8 stitches repeat round 2 six more times round 9- single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 6 stitches round 10- single_crochet in second single_crochet from hook single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 4 stitches round 11- single_crochet in each single_crochet close 2nd part chain 17 work back and forth round 1- turn and single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in each next single_crochet 16 stitches round 2- single_crochet in each next single_crochet repeat round 2 one more time assembly body- fill the head with stuffing with black yarn and and a sewing needle on the neck stitches sew to pucker the neck adjusting to the finger size snout- fill the snout with a little stuffing place with pins with the lower part of the circumference of the snout on the neck sew the circumference and the forehead push with your finger the bottom of the snout and sew to form the cheeks ear- hide the tail of the end of the knitting and use to sew the yarn of the beginning for the black ear internal ear- hide the yarn of the beginning and use to sew the tail of the end of the knitting applewood the long side of the ear goes towards the sides of small bob face sew the internal ear close to the internal side of the black one fold the bottom of the ear and place with pins on top of the head sew them arms- fold and sew start with the natural yarn sewing the hand and then change to the black one because you will use this one to sew the arm to the body fill the arm with flees and then sew the 3rd side flatten the body and sew the arms with the white side of the arm towards the front chest- sew both parts the short side of part 1 in the center of the long side of part 2 place on the body with the long part surrounding almost all the neck sew it sew the eyes place the eyes with
